  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602341.3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602341.3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Bevölkerungspolitik in China. Eine Umfrage</string>
            <string language="en">Population policy of China. An inquiry.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Politique de population de la Chine. Une 
enquête.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Política da população de China. Um 
inquérito.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Politica della popolazione della Cina. 
Un'inchiesta.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολιτική πληθυσμού της Κίνας. Μια έρευνα.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Política de la población de China. Una 
pregunta.</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Umfrage, die Schülerinnen und Schüler bei ihren Mitschülern machen und auswerten sollen. Gefragt wird nach dem Kinderwunsch und der Akzeptanz einer staatlich kontrollierten Bevölkerungspolitik.</string>
            <string language="en">Pupils surveying each other followed by the interpretation. Questionnaire on the desire to have children and on the general acceptance of state controlled population policies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">China</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Bevölkerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Geburtenkontrolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">China</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Birth control</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles s'examinant ont suivi de la traduction. 
Le questionnaire sur le désir d'avoir des enfants et sur 
l'acceptation générale de l'état a contrôlé des politiques de 
population.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas que examinam-se seguiram pela interpretação. 
O questionário no desejo ter crianças e na aceitação geral 
do estado controlou políticas da população.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille che si esaminano sono seguito 
dall'interpretazione. Questionario sul desiderio fare 
dichiarare ai bambini e sull'accettazione generale di le 
politiche controllate della popolazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθητές ο ένας τον άλλον που ακολουθείται που 
ερευνούν από την ερμηνεία. Το ερωτηματολόγιο σχετικά με την
επιθυμία να υπάρξουν τα παιδιά και σχετικά με τη γενική αποδοχή 
του κράτους έλεγξε τις πολιτικές πληθυσμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las pupilas que se examinaban siguieron por la 
interpretación. El cuestionario en el deseo de tener niños y 
en la aceptación general del estado controló políticas de la 
población.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Chine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contrôle des naissances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">China</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">População</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Controle de nascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Cina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Popolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Controllo di nascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληθυσμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλεγχος γέννησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">China</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Población</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Control de la natalidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
